alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 2:33PM AKST until March 01 at 11:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast west of Kivalina. * WHEN...Until 11 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and low visibility in blowing snow is occuring at both Point Hope and Shishmaref. Winds are much less and visibility is much better near Kivalina. Winds will slowly decrease late tonight and conditions will slowly improve then.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
